deepl.title: DeepL API (English Translation)
deepl.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the DeepL API Key? Japanese translation will no longer be available.
deepl.howToGetTitle: How to get a DeepL API Key
howToGetSteps: 1. Create an account on the DeepL website
2. Sign up for the API Free plan (no credit card required)
3. Copy the API Key from your account settings
4. Paste the API Key above and save

yahoo.title: Yahoo! JAPAN API (Japanese Analysis)
yahoo.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the Yahoo! Client ID? Japanese word analysis will no longer be available.
yahoo.howToGetTitle: How to get a Yahoo! Client ID
howToGetSteps: 1. Create or log in to your Yahoo! JAPAN account
2. Create a new application on Yahoo! Developer Network
4. Paste the Client ID above and save
